question_text: Which of the following statements about IPS LCDs are accurate? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They use in-plane crystal alignment to maintain color consistency
They offer slower response times than TN panels
They provide better contrast than VA panels
They are often chosen for color-critical applications
correct_answer: They use in-plane crystal alignment to maintain color consistency
They offer slower response times than TN panels
They are often chosen for color-critical applications
explanation: IPS LCDs trade speed for excellent color fidelity and angle stability, making them a top choice for design and media work.
